page.description: EnableSecurityApplication sets the status of a security application to enabled. Any deployments that are scheduled but would not be run because the security application was disabled will be redeployed.

argument.name: SecurityApplicationName
argument.description: The name of the security application to be enabled.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns .t. if the function call succeeded and .f. if it failed. Look at the CallResult property to determine the cause of a failure.
